wait.long: You'll receive an email as soon as your order's processed. There's currently a high volume of orders.
wait.no_auto_refresh_html: If you're not automatically redirected, refresh this page.

medium.one: Your order's being processed. Estimated wait time is 1 minute.

thank_you.title: Thank you for your purchase!
thank_you.confirmation_email_sent_text: A confirmation email has been sent to {{ email }}
thank_you.thank_you_description_html: We've accepted your order, and we're getting it ready. A confirmation email has been sent to {{ email }}. Come back to this page for updates on your order status.
thank_you.thank_you_description: We've accepted your order, and we're getting it ready. Come back to this page for updates on your order status.
thank_you.confirmed_description_html: We've accepted your order, and we're getting it ready. A confirmation email has been sent to {{ email }}. Come back to this page for updates on your shipment status.
thank_you.confirmed_description: We've accepted your order, and we're getting it ready. Come back to this page for updates on your shipment status.
thank_you.order_updates_description_html: A confirmation was sent to {{ customer_contact }}
thank_you.in_transit_title: Your shipment is on the way
thank_you.in_transit_description: Come back to this page for updates on your shipment status.
thank_you.in_transit_description_days: You should receive your package in the next {{ number }} days.
thank_you.in_transit_description_today: You should receive your package today.
thank_you.no_tracking_number: There is no tracking number for this shipment.
thank_you.out_for_delivery_title: Your shipment is out for delivery
thank_you.out_for_delivery_description_html: Your shipment is on the delivery truck – expect it to arrive today. If you still haven't received it in the next 2 days, please {{ contact_us }}.
thank_you.attempted_delivery_title: An attempt was made to deliver your shipment
thank_you.attempted_delivery_description_html: An attempt was made to deliver your shipment but it was unsuccessful. Please {{ contact_us }} to arrange another delivery attempt.
thank_you.delivered_description_html: Your shipment has been delivered to the address you provided. If you haven't received it, or if you have any other problems, please {{ contact_us }}.
thank_you.failed_contact_merchant: According to {{ company }}, your order couldn't be delivered as planned. Please contact {{ company }} to arrange another delivery attempt.
thank_you.failed_contact_merchant_no_company: Your order couldn't be delivered as planned. Please contact us to arrange another delivery attempt.
thank_you.login_title: Log in to view all shipment details
thank_you.login_description: You can find your order number in the receipt you received via email.
thank_you.cancelled_description: Your order was canceled on {{ date }}. Please contact us if you have any questions.
thank_you.unfulfilled_items_description: We are currently preparing these items for shipment.
